name: Fundraiser for the Palestinian community of Umm Al-Khair
description: The financial situation in the West Bank is dire, especially for small communities who have for decades relied on shepherding and agriculture for a living but trying to do so today poses a direct life threat. Like the rest of the village of Massafer Yatta in the Occupied West Bank, beyond the struggle with direct zionist violence from colonial forces and settlers, the village of Umm Al-Khair is also in a financial struggle.
